### Harita
    
```{r harita, echo=FALSE}
pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "YlOrRd",
  domain = eqtr$xm
)

eqtr %>% filter(xm>4.5) %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~long, 
                   lat = ~lat, 
                   fillColor = pal(eqtr$xm),
                   stroke = F,
                   popup = ~htmlEscape(as.character(xm))) %>% 
  addLegend("bottomright", pal = pal, values = ~xm,
    opacity = 1
  )
```
